name: BrexitCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open Brexit Countdown”
”Alexa, start Brexit Countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: brexit countdown
des: This skill will tell you how many days are left until latest Brexit Deadline (31st January). Just say "Alexa, open Brexit Countdown" and be told the number of days as well as a humorous closing remark.
